verses.verse: וּבַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> u-va-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I And in the seventh בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> be-'e-Chad on the first לַחֹ֗דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh, [day] of the month מִֽקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> mik-ra- convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> ko-desh ye shall have an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh have לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> me-Le-chet work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dah no servile לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su; ye shall do י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom it is a day תְּרוּעָ֖ה <S%H8643><s%> te-ru-'Ah of blowing יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh have לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֨ם <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-si-Tem And ye shall offer עֹלָ֜ה <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah a burnt offering לְרֵ֤יחַ <S%H7381><s%> le-Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach for a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD פַּ֧ר <S%H6499><s%> par bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- of the first בָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar young אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one אַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> 'A-yil ram אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; one כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <S%H3532><s%> ke-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- old שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year שִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah [and] seven תְּמִימִֽם׃ <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim. without blemish

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <S%H4503><s%> u-min-cha-Tam, And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-Sha-men; with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah three עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> lap-Par, for a bullock שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei [and] two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֖ים <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לָאָֽיִל׃ <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil. for a ram

וְעִשָּׂר֣וֹן <S%H6241><s%> ve-'is-sa-Ron tenth deal אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, And one לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lak-Ke-ves lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad; for one לְשִׁבְעַ֖ת <S%H7651><s%> le-shiv-'At throughout the seven הַכְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <S%H3532><s%> hak-ke-va-Sim. lambs

וּשְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> u-se-'ir- kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad And one חַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat; [for] a sin offering לְכַפֵּ֖ר <S%H3722><s%> le-chap-Per to make an atonement עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem. and

מִלְּבַד֩ <S%H905><s%> mil-le-Vad alone עֹלַ֨ת <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lat Beside the burnt offering הַחֹ֜דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> ha-Cho-desh of the month וּמִנְחָתָ֗הּ <S%H4503><s%> u-min-cha-Tah, and his meat offering וְעֹלַ֤ת <S%H5930><s%> ve-'o-Lat burnt offering הַתָּמִיד֙ <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid and the daily וּמִנְחָתָ֔הּ <S%H4503><s%> u-min-cha-Tah, and his meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H5262><s%> ve-nis-kei-Hem and their drink offerings כְּמִשְׁפָּטָ֑ם <S%H4941><s%> ke-mish-pa-Tam; according unto their manner לְרֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> le-Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach, for a sweet אִשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh a sacrifice made by fire לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD ס sa-Mek

וּבֶעָשׂוֹר֩ <S%H6218><s%> u-ve-'a-sOr And ye shall have on the tenth לַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I [day] of this seventh הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, of this מִֽקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> mik-ra- convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> ko-desh an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh shall have לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, וְעִנִּיתֶ֖ם <S%H6031><s%> ve-'in-ni-Tem and ye shall afflict אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> naf-sho-tei-Chem; your souls כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any מְלָאכָ֖ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah any work לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su. ye shall not do

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֨ם <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-rav-Tem But ye shall offer עֹלָ֤ה <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah a burnt offering לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD רֵ֣יחַ <S%H7381><s%> Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֔חַ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach, [for] a sweet פַּ֧ר <S%H6499><s%> par bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- of the first בָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> ba-Kar young אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad one אַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> 'A-yil ram אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; one כְּבָשִׂ֤ים <S%H3532><s%> ke-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- old שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year שִׁבְעָ֔ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah, [and] seven תְּמִימִ֖ם <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim they shall be unto you without blemish יִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu having לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <S%H4503><s%> u-min-cha-Tam, And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-Sha-men; with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah three עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> lap-Par, to a bullock שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei [and] two עֶשְׂרֹנִ֔ים <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim, tenth deals לָאַ֖יִל <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil ram הָאֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad. to one

עִשָּׂרוֹן֙ <S%H6241><s%> 'is-sa-rOn A several tenth deal עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <S%H6241><s%> is-sa-Ron, A tenth לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lak-Ke-ves lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad; for one לְשִׁבְעַ֖ת <S%H7651><s%> le-shiv-'At throughout the seven הַכְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <S%H3532><s%> hak-ke-va-Sim. lambs

שְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> se-'ir- kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad One חַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat; [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַ֞ד <S%H905><s%> mil-le-Vad alone חַטַּ֤את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat beside the sin offering הַכִּפֻּרִים֙ <S%H3725><s%> hak-kip-pu-Rim of atonement וְעֹלַ֣ת <S%H5930><s%> ve-'o-Lat burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid, and the continual וּמִנְחָתָ֖הּ <S%H4503><s%> u-min-cha-Tah and the meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5262><s%> ve-nis-kei-Hem. of it and their drink offerings פ Peh

וּבַחֲמִשָּׁה֩ <S%H2568><s%> u-va-cha-mish-Shah fif עָשָׂ֨ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen י֜וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, of the seventh מִֽקְרָא־ <S%H4744><s%> mik-ra- convocation קֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H6944><s%> ko-desh ye shall have an holy יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh shall have לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all manner מְלֶ֥אכֶת <S%H4399><s%> me-Le-chet work עֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dah no servile לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תַעֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su; ye shall do וְחַגֹּתֶ֥ם <S%H2287><s%> ve-chag-go-Tem and ye shall keep חַ֛ג <S%H2282><s%> chag a feast לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. days

וְהִקְרַבְתֶּ֨ם <S%H7126><s%> ve-hik-rav-Tem And ye shall offer עֹלָ֜ה <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lah a burnt offering אִשֵּׁ֨ה <S%H801><s%> 'ish-Sheh a sacrifice made by fire רֵ֤יחַ <S%H7381><s%> Rei-ach savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H5207><s%> ni-Cho-ach of a sweet לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD פָּרִ֧ים <S%H6499><s%> pa-Rim bullocks בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the first בָקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> va-Kar bull שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah three עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten אֵילִ֣ם <S%H352><s%> 'ei-Lim rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim; two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <S%H3532><s%> ke-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- old שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen תְּמִימִ֥ם <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim they shall be without blemish יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu. and their grain

וּמִנְחָתָ֔ם <S%H4503><s%> u-min-cha-Tam, And their meat offering סֹ֖לֶת <S%H5560><s%> So-let [shall be of] flour בְּלוּלָ֣ה <S%H1101><s%> be-lu-Lah mingled בַשָּׁ֑מֶן <S%H8081><s%> vash-Sha-men; with oil שְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah three עֶשְׂרֹנִ֜ים <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לַפָּ֣ר <S%H6499><s%> lap-Par bullock הָֽאֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad, unto every לִשְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> lish-lo-Shah three עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten פָּרִ֔ים <S%H6499><s%> pa-Rim, bullocks שְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei two עֶשְׂרֹנִים֙ <S%H6241><s%> 'es-ro-Nim tenth deals לָאַ֣יִל <S%H352><s%> la-'A-yil ram הָֽאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad, to each לִשְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> lish-Nei of the two הָאֵילִֽם׃ <S%H352><s%> ha-'ei-Lim. rams

וְעִשָּׂרׅוֹן֙ <S%H6241><s%> ve-'is-sa-rOn And a several tenth deal עִשָּׂר֔וֹן <S%H6241><s%> is-sa-Ron, tenth לַכֶּ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> lak-Ke-ves lamb הָאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad; to each לְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> le-'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen כְּבָשִֽׂים׃ <S%H3532><s%> ke-va-Sim. lambs

וּשְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> u-se-'ir- kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad And one חַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat; [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַד֙ <S%H905><s%> mil-le-Vad alone עֹלַ֣ת <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lat burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid, beside the continual מִנְחָתָ֖הּ <S%H4503><s%> min-cha-Tah his meat offering וְנִסְכָּֽהּ׃ <S%H5262><s%> ve-nis-Kah. and his drink offering ס sa-Mek

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-vai-Yom day הַשֵּׁנִ֗י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, And on the second פָּרִ֧ים <S%H6499><s%> pa-Rim bullocks בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the first בָקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> va-Kar bull שְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Neim two עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten אֵילִ֣ם <S%H352><s%> 'ei-Lim rams שְׁנָ֑יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim; two כְּבָשִׂ֧ים <S%H3532><s%> ke-va-Sim lambs בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- old שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> 'ar-ba-'Ah four עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar teen תְּמִימִֽם׃ <S%H8549><s%> te-mi-Mim. without spot

וּמִנְחָתָ֣ם <S%H4503><s%> u-min-cha-Tam And their meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶ֡ם <S%H5262><s%> ve-nis-kei-Hem and their drink offerings לַ֠פָּרִים <S%H6499><s%> Lap-pa-rim for the bullocks לָאֵילִ֧ם <S%H352><s%> la-'ei-Lim for the rams וְלַכְּבָשִׂ֛ים <S%H3532><s%> ve-lak-ke-va-Sim and for the lambs בְּמִסְפָּרָ֖ם <S%H4557><s%> be-mis-pa-Ram [shall be] according to their number כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> kam-mish-Pat. after the manner

וּשְׂעִיר־ <S%H8163><s%> u-se-'ir- kid עִזִּ֥ים <S%H5795><s%> 'iz-Zim of the goats אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad And one חַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> chat-Tat; [for] a sin offering מִלְּבַד֙ <S%H905><s%> mil-le-Vad alone עֹלַ֣ת <S%H5930><s%> 'o-Lat burnt offering הַתָּמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> hat-ta-Mid, beside the continual וּמִנְחָתָ֖הּ <S%H4503><s%> u-min-cha-Tah and the meat offering וְנִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5262><s%> ve-nis-kei-Hem. thereof and their drink offerings ס sa-Mek
